name: Zombie Survivals [18+]
description:
Zombie Survivals [18+]🧟‍♀️🔞is a blend of top-down shooter and visual novel.
The world of the game is the ruins of the city after the zombie apocalypse.
The enemies are hordes of zombies who want to kill the main character.
The player's goal is to pass levels by surviving and completing level objectives.
During the passage of the level the player's character is pumping, acquiring new abilities and weapons.
In the story, the GM defends the house and the girl with whom he lives, from the zombies.
For this she rewards him with sex.
Features:
Gunplay with zombies
Lots of weapons to choose
Hot scenes to unlock
Many indecent scenes with the main character
A Multitude of Sexy Situations
